definition: to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate

sentences.english: A ski jump in Innsbruck, Austria.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞因斯布魯克的一個滑雪跳臺。

sentences.english: A landing slops is for ski jumping or ski soaring.
sentences.chinese: 着陸山坡是爲跳臺滑雪頁準備的。

sentences.english: Did you ever try platform diving?
If you thought the last two were hard, try this one.
sentences.chinese: 如果你認爲最後兩個跳臺非常困難，那麼來試試這個。

sentences.english: Team events were added in Nordic combined and ski jumping.
sentences.chinese: 團體比賽中增加了跳臺滑雪和雪橇比賽。

sentences.english: This was surprising because I had trained mostly on the platform.
sentences.chinese: 這是驚人的，因爲我主要只是進行了跳臺訓練。

sentences.english: Launching your body from a platform or springboard into a deep pool of water.
sentences.chinese: 從跳臺或跳板上起跳，進入深小池。

sentences.english: Using step down test tested the cognitive function.
sentences.chinese: 認知功能測驗採用跳臺法。

sentences.english: The preliminary competition for the women's 10-meter platform diving will be held this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 女子跳水10米跳臺預賽將在今天下午舉行。
